mapper.select: select cgg_code, adm_dispo_ymd, TO_CHAR(gnt_no) as gnt_no, snt_cob_nm, snt_uptae_nm, upso_nm, site_addr_rd, site_addr, drt_insp_ymd, dispo_ctn, bas_law, vior_ymd, viol_cn, dispo_ctn_dt, dispo_gigan, insp_gbn_code, take_ymd from biz_d where upso_nm like '%'||#{upso_nm}||'%' and site_addr like '%'||#{site_addr}||'%' ORDER BY ADM_DISPO_YMD desc
